#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
        int t,i;
        cin >> t;
        while ( t-- )
        {
                char  str[101];
                cin >> str;
                int len = strlen (str);
        for ( i = (len/2)-1; i >= 0 ; i-- ){
                cout << str[i];
        }
        for ( i = (len)-1 ; i >= (len/2) ; i-- ){
                cout << str[i];
        }
                cout << endl;
        }

        return 0;
}
